verses.verse: And Abraham <WH85> was old <WH2204>, and well stricken <WH935> in age <WH3117>: and Jehovah <WH3068> had blessed <WH1288> Abraham in all things <WH85>.

And Abraham <WH85> said <WH559> unto his servant <WH5650>, the elder <WH2205> of his house <WH1004>, that ruled over <WH4910> all that he had <WH7760>, Put, I pray thee <WH3027>, thy hand under my thigh <WH3409>:

and I will make thee swear <WH7650> by Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of heaven <WH8064> and the God <WH430> of the earth <WH776>, that thou wilt not take <WH3947> a wife <WH802> for my son <WH1121> of the daughters <WH1323> of the Canaanites <WH3669>, among <WH7130> whom I dwell <WH3427>:
but thou shalt go <WH3212> unto my country <WH776>, and to my kindred <WH4138>, and take <WH3947> a wife <WH802> for my son <WH1121> Isaac <WH3327>.

And the servant <WH5650> said <WH559> unto him <WH802>, Peradventure the woman will not be willing <WH14> to follow <WH3212> me <WH310> unto this land <WH776>: must I needs bring <WH7725> thy son <WH1121> again <WH7725> unto the land <WH776> from whence thou camest <WH3318>?
And Abraham <WH85> said <WH559> unto him <WH8104>, Beware thou that thou bring <WH7725> not <WH6435> my son <WH1121> thither again <WH7725>.

Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of heaven <WH8064>, who took me <WH3947> from my father <WH1>'s house <WH1004>, and from the land <WH776> of my nativity <WH4138>, and who spake <WH1696> unto me <WH7650>, and who sware unto me <WH559>, saying, Unto thy seed <WH2233> will I give <WH5414> this land <WH776>; he will send <WH7971> his angel <WH4397> before thee <WH6440>, and thou shalt take <WH3947> a wife <WH802> for my son from thence <WH1121>.

And if the woman <WH802> be not willing <WH14> to follow <WH3212> thee <WH310>, then thou shalt be clear <WH5352> from this my oath <WH7621>; only thou shalt not bring <WH7725> my son <WH1121> thither again <WH7725>.
And the servant <WH5650> put <WH7760> his hand <WH3027> under the thigh <WH3409> of Abraham <WH85> his master <WH113>, and sware <WH7650> to him concerning <WH5921> this <WH2088> matter <WH1697>.

And the servant <WH5650> took <WH3947> ten <WH6235> camels <WH1581>, of the camels <WH1581> of his master <WH113>, and departed <WH3212>, having all goodly things <WH2898> of his master <WH113>'s in his hand <WH3027>: and he arose <WH6965>, and went <WH3212> to Mesopotamia <WH763>, unto the city <WH5892> of Nahor <WH5152>.

And he made <WH1288> the camels <WH1581> to kneel down <WH1288> without <WH2351> the city <WH5892> by <WH413> the well <WH875> of water <WH4325> at the time <WH6256> of evening <WH6153>, the time <WH6256> that women go out <WH3318> to draw water <WH7579>.

And he said <WH559>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of my master <WH113> Abraham <WH85>, send me <WH6440>, I pray thee <WH7136>, good speed this day <WH3117>, and show <WH6213> kindness <WH2617> unto <WH5973> my master <WH113> Abraham <WH85>.
Behold <WH5324>, I am standing by the fountain <WH5869> of water <WH4325>; and the daughters <WH1323> of the men <WH582> of the city <WH5892> are coming out <WH3318> to draw <WH7579> water <WH4325>:

and let it come to pass <WH5291>, that the damsel to whom I shall say <WH559>, Let down <WH5186> thy pitcher <WH3537>, I pray thee <WH8354>, that I may drink; and she shall say <WH559>, Drink <WH8354>, and I will give <WH8248> thy camels <WH1581> drink <WH8248> also <WH3198>: let the same be she that thou hast appointed for thy servant <WH5650> Isaac <WH3327>; and thereby shall I know <WH3045> that thou hast showed <WH6213> kindness <WH2617> unto my master <WH113>.

And it came to pass <WH3615>, before he had done speaking <WH1696>, that <WH7259>, behold, Rebekah came out <WH3318>, who <WH834> was born <WH3205> to Bethuel <WH1328> the son <WH1121> of Milcah <WH4435>, the wife <WH802> of Nahor <WH5152>, Abraham <WH85>'s brother <WH251>, with her pitcher <WH3537> upon her shoulder <WH7926>.

And the damsel <WH5291> was very <WH3966> fair <WH2896> to look upon <WH4758>, a virgin <WH1330>, neither had any man <WH376> known <WH3045> her <WH3381>: and she went down to the fountain <WH5869>, and filled <WH4390> her pitcher <WH3537>, and came up <WH5927>.
And the servant <WH5650> ran <WH7323> to meet her <WH7125>, and said <WH559>, Give me to drink <WH1572>, I pray thee <WH4592>, a little water <WH4325> from thy pitcher <WH3537>.
And she said <WH559>, Drink <WH8354>, my lord <WH113>: and she hasted <WH4116>, and let down <WH3381> her pitcher <WH3537> upon her hand <WH3027>, and gave him drink <WH8248>.
And when she had done <WH3615> giving him drink <WH8248>, she said <WH559>, I will draw <WH7579> for thy camels <WH1581> also <WH3615>, until they have done drinking <WH8354>.

And she hasted <WH4116>, and emptied <WH6168> her pitcher <WH3537> into the trough <WH8268>, and ran <WH7323> again unto the well <WH875> to draw <WH7579>, and drew <WH7579> for all his camels <WH1581>.
And the man <WH376> looked stedfastly <WH7583> on her <WH2790>, holding his peace, to know <WH3045> whether Jehovah <WH3068> had made <WH6743> his journey <WH1870> prosperous <WH6743> or not <WH518>.

And it came to pass <WH1581>, as the camels had done <WH3615> drinking <WH8354>, that the man <WH376> took <WH3947> a golden <WH2091> ring <WH5141> of half a shekel <WH1235> weight <WH4948>, and two <WH8147> bracelets <WH6781> for her hands <WH3027> of ten <WH6235> shekels weight <WH4948> of gold <WH2091>,
and said <WH559>, Whose <WH4310> daughter <WH1323> art thou <WH859>? tell <WH5046> me <WH3426>, I pray thee. Is there room <WH4725> in thy father <WH1>'s house <WH1004> for us to lodge in <WH3885>?
And she said <WH559> unto him <WH1323>, I am the daughter of Bethuel <WH1328> the son <WH1121> of Milcah <WH4435>, whom she bare <WH3205> unto Nahor <WH5152>.
She said <WH559> moreover unto him <WH1571>, We have both straw <WH8401> and provender <WH4554> enough <WH7227>, and <WH1571> room <WH4725> to lodge in <WH3885>.
And the man <WH376> bowed his head <WH6915>, and worshipped <WH7812> Jehovah <WH3068>.

And he said <WH559>, Blessed <WH1288> be Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of my master <WH113> Abraham <WH85>, who hath not forsaken <WH5800> his lovingkindness <WH2617> and his truth <WH571> toward my master <WH113>: as for me <WH3068>, Jehovah hath led me <WH5148> in the way <WH1870> to the house <WH1004> of my master <WH113>'s brethren <WH251>.
And the damsel <WH5291> ran <WH7323>, and told <WH5046> her mother <WH517>'s house <WH1004> according to these words <WH1697>.
And Rebekah <WH7259> had a brother <WH251>, and his name <WH8034> was Laban <WH3837>: and Laban <WH3837> ran <WH7323> out <WH2351> unto the man <WH376>, unto the fountain <WH5869>.

And it came to pass <WH7200>, when he saw the ring <WH5141>, and the bracelets <WH6781> upon his sister <WH269>'s hands <WH3027>, and when he heard <WH8085> the words <WH1697> of Rebekah <WH7259> his sister <WH269>, saying <WH559>, Thus <WH3541> spake <WH1696> the man <WH376> unto me <WH935>; that he came unto the man <WH376>; and <WH5975>, behold, he was standing by <WH5921> the camels <WH1581> at the fountain <WH5869>.

And he said <WH559>, Come in <WH935>, thou blessed <WH1288> of Jehovah <WH3068>; wherefore standest <WH5975> thou without <WH2351>? for I have prepared <WH6437> the house <WH1004>, and room <WH4725> for the camels <WH1581>.

And the man <WH376> came <WH935> into the house <WH1004>, and he ungirded <WH6605> the camels <WH1581>; and he gave <WH5414> straw <WH8401> and provender <WH4554> for the camels <WH1581>, and water <WH4325> to wash <WH7364> his feet <WH7272> and the feet <WH7272> of the men that were with him <WH582>.

And there was set <WH7760> food before him <WH6440> to eat <WH398>: but he said <WH559>, I will not eat <WH398>, until I have told <WH1696> mine errand <WH1697>. And he said <WH559>, Speak on <WH1696>.
And he said <WH559>, I am Abraham <WH85>'s servant <WH5650>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> hath blessed <WH1288> my master <WH113> greatly <WH3966>; and he is become great <WH1431>: and he hath given <WH5414> him flocks <WH6629> and herds <WH1241>, and silver <WH3701> and gold <WH2091>, and men-servants <WH5650> and maid-servants <WH8198>, and camels <WH1581> and asses <WH2543>.
And Sarah <WH8283> my master <WH113>'s wife <WH802> bare <WH3205> a son <WH1121> to my master <WH113> when <WH310> she was old <WH2209>: and unto him hath he given all that he hath <WH5414>.

And my master <WH113> made me swear <WH7650>, saying <WH559>, Thou shalt not take <WH3947> a wife <WH802> for my son <WH1121> of the daughters <WH1323> of the Canaanites <WH3669>, in whose land <WH776> I dwell <WH3427>:
but <WH518> thou shalt go <WH3212> unto my father <WH1>'s house <WH1004>, and to my kindred <WH4940>, and take <WH3947> a wife <WH802> for my son <WH1121>.
And I said <WH559> unto my master <WH113>, Peradventure the woman <WH802> will not follow me <WH3212>.

And he said <WH559> unto me <WH3068>, Jehovah, before <WH6440> whom I walk <WH1980>, will send <WH7971> his angel <WH4397> with thee <WH6743>, and prosper thy way <WH1870>; and thou shalt take <WH3947> a wife <WH802> for my son <WH1121> of my kindred <WH4940>, and of my father <WH1>'s house <WH1004>:
then shalt thou be clear <WH5352> from my oath <WH423>, when thou comest <WH935> to my kindred <WH4940>; and if they give <WH5414> her not to thee <WH5355>, thou shalt be clear from my oath <WH423>.

And I came <WH935> this day <WH3117> unto the fountain <WH5869>, and said <WH559>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of my master <WH113> Abraham <WH85>, if now thou do <WH3426> prosper <WH6743> my way <WH1870> which I go <WH1980>:

behold <WH5324>, I am standing by the fountain <WH5869> of water <WH4325>; and let it come to pass <WH5959>, that the maiden that cometh forth <WH3318> to draw <WH7579>, to whom I shall say <WH559>, Give me <WH8248>, I pray thee <WH4592>, a little water <WH4325> from thy pitcher <WH3537> to drink <WH8248>;

and she shall say <WH559> to me <WH8354>, Both drink thou <WH7579>, and I will also draw for thy camels <WH1581>: let the same be the woman <WH802> whom Jehovah <WH3068> hath appointed <WH3198> for my master <WH113>'s son <WH1121>.

And before I had done <WH3615> speaking <WH1696> in my heart <WH3820>, behold <WH7259>, Rebekah came forth <WH3318> with her pitcher <WH3537> on her shoulder <WH7926>; and she went down <WH3381> unto the fountain <WH5869>, and drew <WH7579>: and I said <WH559> unto her <WH8248>, Let me drink, I pray thee.

And she made haste <WH4116>, and let down <WH3381> her pitcher <WH3537> from her shoulder <WH559>, and said, Drink <WH8354>, and I will give <WH8248> thy camels <WH1581> drink <WH8248> also <WH8354>: so I drank, and she made <WH8248> the camels <WH1581> drink also <WH8248>.

And I asked <WH7592> her <WH559>, and said, Whose daughter <WH1323> art thou <WH559>? And she said, The daughter <WH1323> of Bethuel <WH1328>, Nahor <WH5152>'s son <WH1121>, whom Milcah <WH4435> bare <WH3205> unto him <WH7760>: and I put the ring <WH5141> upon her nose <WH639>, and the bracelets <WH6781> upon her hands <WH3027>.

And I bowed my head <WH6915>, and worshipped <WH7812> Jehovah <WH3068>, and blessed <WH1288> Jehovah <WH3068>, the God <WH430> of my master <WH113> Abraham <WH85>, who had led me <WH5148> in the right <WH571> way <WH1870> to take <WH3947> my master <WH113>'s brother <WH251>'s daughter <WH1323> for his son <WH1121>.

And now if ye will <WH3426> deal <WH6213> kindly <WH2617> and truly <WH571> with my master <WH113>, tell <WH5046> me <WH5046>: and if not, tell me <WH6437>; that I may turn to the right hand <WH3225>, or <WH176> to the left <WH8040>.

Then Laban <WH3837> and Bethuel <WH1328> answered <WH6030> and said <WH559>, The thing <WH1697> proceedeth <WH3318> from Jehovah <WH3068>: we cannot <WH3201> speak <WH1696> unto thee bad <WH7451> or <WH176> good <WH2896>.
Behold <WH7259>, Rebekah is before thee <WH6440>, take <WH3947> her <WH3212>, and go, and let her be thy master <WH113>'s son <WH1121>'s wife <WH802>, as Jehovah <WH3068> hath spoken <WH1696>.
And it came to pass <WH85>, that, when Abraham's servant <WH5650> heard <WH8085> their words <WH1697>, he bowed himself down <WH7812> to the earth <WH776> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.

And the servant <WH5650> brought forth <WH3318> jewels <WH3627> of silver <WH3701>, and jewels <WH3627> of gold <WH2091>, and raiment <WH899>, and gave <WH5414> them to Rebekah <WH7259>: he gave <WH5414> also to her brother <WH251> and to her mother <WH517> precious things <WH4030>.

And they did eat <WH398> and drink <WH8354>, he and the men <WH582> that were with him <WH3885>, and tarried all night; and they rose up <WH6965> in the morning <WH1242>, and he said <WH559>, Send me away <WH7971> unto my master <WH113>.

And her brother <WH251> and her mother <WH517> said <WH559>, Let the damsel <WH5291> abide <WH3427> with us a few days <WH3117>, at the least <WH176> ten <WH6218>; after <WH310> that she shall go <WH3212>.
And he said <WH559> unto them <WH309>, Hinder me not <WH3068>, seeing Jehovah hath prospered <WH6743> my way <WH1870>; send me away <WH7971> that I may go <WH3212> to my master <WH113>.
And they said <WH559>, We will call <WH7121> the damsel <WH5291>, and inquire <WH7592> at her mouth <WH6310>.
And they called <WH7121> Rebekah <WH7259>, and said <WH559> unto her <WH3212>, Wilt thou go with this man <WH376>? And she said <WH559>, I will go <WH3212>.
And they sent away <WH7971> Rebekah <WH7259> their sister <WH269>, and her nurse <WH3243>, and Abraham <WH85>'s servant <WH5650>, and his men <WH582>.

And they blessed <WH1288> Rebekah <WH7259>, and said <WH559> unto her <WH859>, Our sister <WH269>, be thou <WH1961> the mother of thousands <WH505> of ten thousands <WH7233>, and let thy seed <WH2233> possess <WH3423> the gate <WH8179> of those that hate them <WH8130>.

And Rebekah <WH7259> arose <WH6965>, and her damsels <WH5291>, and they rode <WH7392> upon the camels <WH1581>, and followed <WH3212> the man <WH376>: and the servant <WH5650> took <WH3947> Rebekah <WH7259>, and went his way <WH3212>.
And Isaac <WH3327> came <WH935> from the way <WH935> of Beer-lahai <WH883>-roi; for he dwelt <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of the South <WH5045>.

And Isaac <WH3327> went out <WH3318> to meditate <WH7742> in <WH6437> the field <WH7704> at the eventide <WH6153>: and he lifted up <WH5375> his eyes <WH5869>, and saw <WH7200>, and <WH1581>, behold, there were camels coming <WH935>.
And Rebekah <WH7259> lifted up <WH5375> her eyes <WH5869>, and when she saw <WH7200> Isaac <WH3327>, she alighted <WH5307> from <WH5921> the camel <WH1581>.

And she said <WH559> unto the servant <WH5650>, What <WH4310> man <WH376> is this <WH1976> that walketh <WH1980> in the field <WH7704> to meet us <WH7125>? And the servant <WH5650> said <WH559>, It is my master <WH113>: and she took <WH3947> her veil <WH6809>, and covered herself <WH3680>.
And the servant <WH5650> told <WH5608> Isaac <WH3327> all the things <WH1697> that he had done <WH6213>.

And Isaac <WH3327> brought her <WH935> into his mother <WH517> Sarah <WH8283>'s tent <WH168>, and took <WH3947> Rebekah <WH7259>, and she became his wife <WH802>; and he loved <WH157> her <WH3327>: and Isaac was comforted <WH5162> after <WH310> his mother <WH517>'s death.
